messages.title: A local voice
messages.content: I’m a retired Primary School Headteacher, whose family all live within the town. I have as much of a vested interest in how it develops and the opportunities it provides to all of us, young and old, as anyone else living here.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Vote to properly fund the NHS, Social Care and Education and for investment in our economy, transport and energy.
Vote to share funds allocated to grammar and free schools to education for all children as a first step to fay fair funding.
Vote to guarantee the triple lock on the state pension.
Vote to introduce rent controls, to increase the minimum wage to £10, to abolish zero-hour contracts and to introduce universal free school meals.
Vote to abolish the bedroom tax and tuition fees and against income tax increases for those earning below £80,000 a year.

issues.education: Vote to share funds allocated to grammar and free schools to education for all children as a first step to fay fair funding.
issues.health: Vote to properly fund the NHS, Social Care and Education and for investment in our economy, transport and energy.
issues.socialWelfare: Vote to introduce rent controls, to increase the minimum wage to £10, to abolish zero-hour contracts and to introduce universal free school meals.

housing.content: I am not a career politician and I firmly believe in the benefits of living as a Constituency MP fully focused on our most significant local issues such as: a lack of affordable and social housing; a badly clogged up and painful to use road system; an overcrowded and too local Health Centres; a railway line that is crying out for new investment, while the HS2 line will pass through and have no benefit whatsoever locally; and a town centre that is in desperate need of pedestrianisation.

leaflet.personalStatement: Having been born in and lived in Aylesbury for the whole of my life, I know the town and the Constituency of Aylesbury very well indeed.

images.caption: Mark Bateman with a background of a green park area.
